author: Lupin 7
subject: Fan Art
body:
Hi Gang,

I'm compiling a collection of Lupin Fan Art for my site and was wondering if 
anyone on the list had any they'd like to see online? All credit is given, 
of course. I've gotten two up now and a third person who's working on 
something; I uploaded the page in case anyone wanted to look it over, it's 
here:
http://www.not-of-this-earth.st/fa.html
The first person is my brother; I may not have mentioned him when I 
introduced myself to the list; his name is Steven, he lives in Japan and is 
a comic artist, hence the sharp contrast between his work and mine(this is 
even more pronounced since that work was found in a pile of junk, its at 
least 4-6 years old). Just a bit of warning though, if you click on the back 
home link at the bottom it will take you to the index of the site I uploaded 
it to(not my site but one I am making); you might like to see it though, 
more of Steven's art, stuff that is only  a month or so old.

Anyone have anything? Bruce? Luis? AL3?

Question & comments, can be mailed to me or to the list.

Thanx,

David

PS. I just thought I'd mention the word 'busty' again, in case it hasn't 
been said enough;) Seconds anyone?
